Artist.Name: Vincent Van Gogh
Artist.Description: Vincent Willem van Gogh was a Dutch Post-Impressionist painter who is among the most famous and influential figures in the history of Western art.
Artist.Famous: Sunflowers (F.458), repetition of the 4th version (yellow background)

Artist.Name: Pablo Picasso
Artist.Description: Pablo Picasso was a Spanish painter, sculptor, printmaker, ceramicist, stage designer, poet and playwright who spent most of his adult life in France

Artist.Name: Claude Monet
Artist.Description: Oscar-Claude Monet was a founder of French Impressionist painting, and the most consistent and prolific practitioner of the movement's philosophy of expressing one's perceptions before nature, especially as applied to plein-air landscape painting.

Artist.Name: Leonardo da Vinci
Artist.Description: Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci more commonly Leonardo da Vinci or simply Leonardo, was an Italian Renaissance polymath

Artist.Name: Michelangelo
Artist.Description: Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni or more commonly known by his first name Michelangelo was an Italian sculptor, painter, architect and poet of the High Renaissance.
